text: Banco Itaú was an Argentine banking entity owned by Banco Itaú. It was the Argentine subsidiary of the Brazilian bank Itaú Unibanco, founded in 1998 after the purchase of Banco del Buen Ayre. The entity had 99 bank branches and 140 ATMs throughout the country and more than 400,000 clients. On November 2, 2023, after the approval of the BCRA, the entity officially passed into the hands of Banco Macro and was renamed Macro BMA. ==References== Category:Companies based in Buenos Aires Category:Banks of Argentina
title: Banco Itaú (Argentina)
